definitions.definition: Not justified , having no justification , unwarranted .
examples: the unjustified killing of an innocent

definitions.definition: Not justified ( of text, arranged on a page or a computer screen such that the left and right ends of all lines within paragraphs are aligned )

main_definition: Not justified , having no justification , unwarranted .
secondary_definitions: ( typography ) Not justified ( of text, arranged on a page or a computer screen such that the left and right ends of all lines within paragraphs are aligned )
